title: Ultra-high performance of ionic thermoelectric-electrochemical gel cells for harvesting low grade heat
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01150C, Paper
Yongbin Zhu, Cheng-Gong Han, Jiawei Chen, Lijuan Yang, Yingming Ma, Hongyu Guan, Dongxue Han, Li Niu
An ionic thermoelectric-electrochemical (i-TE-EC) cell constructed using asymmetric gels shows ultra-high thermoelectric performance.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
